mapper.insert: insert into attendance (class_name, class_about, class_startdate, class_enddate) values(#{class_name},#{class_about}, #{class_startdate}, #{class_enddate})
mapper.select: select class_name, class_about, class_startdate, class_enddate from class where class_idx = #{class_idx}
select class_name, class_about, class_startdate, class_enddate from class where class_idx > 0
mapper.update: update class set class_name =#{class_name}, class_about =#{class_about},class_startdate =#{class_startdate},class_enddate =#{class_enddate} where class_idx = #{class_idx}
